website_summaries.verdict: A popular brand that has nutritious ingredients and flavor most dogs enjoy. Though not premium, it provides good results for most canines without breaking your budget.
pros: Earns praise for being enticing to most dogs that try it, and resulting in weight loss with regular feedings
Doesn't contain artificial flavors or sugar
Falls on the lower end of the price spectrum for weight management dry dog food
cons: Contains fillers, including corn, and animal by-products
May cause a bit of stomach upset, such as gas, in some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: On my pooch’s last visit to the vet, she suggested that he could stand to lose 5 or 6 pounds. I usually feed him Pedigree Large Breed dog food. By mixing Healthy Weight, roughly half and half, with his usual food, we have achieved the weight loss. He always acts like he hasn’t been feed for a week (looks up with pleading eyes), so I’ve wondered if he’s getting his fill. Since he would eat an entire bag of any type of Pedigree if left to his own devices, I will just have to trust that he is getting the amount of food he needs.
customer_reviews.author: EddyABQTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fine Product
customer_reviews.text: Our two 'girls' - pups - have been on this food they're entire long lives and are as fit and energized as ever, just like any dogs we see in all the dog-food commercials. Sure I would like to have been able to afford some of what you might consider 'premium' dog food, but with all other family expenses, we just can't, but I would not have kept them on this food had I thought or observed in anyway, that it was detrimental to them. Both are 13 years and they look to have many more with us - and I look forward to that. [We also have regular vet appointments, so that certainly is helpful as well.]
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Manages Weight very Well!  Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large German Shepherd that is my service dog. He is larger than a typical German Shepherd. German Shepherds are prone to hip dysplasia that is just a given risk with the breed. I realized my boy needed to lose weight in an effort to reduce his risk of hip dysplasia. Therefore, I switched him to Pedigree Healthy Weight Management dry food, and canned food. He has successfully got down to a much healthier weight, and is maintaining it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about this product is that it has a ziplock bag so the food dont go stale.
customer_reviews.text: My 1st 2 shipments of this dog food did have the ziplock bags but the last one for some odd reason didnt thankfully I still had a little bit of food in the last bag so I just dumped the new bag inside the old one. Other than that the dog loves this food nd it seems like its actually making him lose some weight bc he is an old heavy dog.
customer_reviews.author: A.moy6911

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negative about pedigree
customer_reviews.text: My mom and grandmother have used this for YEARS, please do not listen to the negative comments about this brand. All the dogs have lived long healthy lives. My vet even said good ole pedigree is perfectly fine food. She loves his shiny and soft coat, that’s why she asked in the first place. She also said whatever you are doing to this boy keep it up, he’s perfectly healthy
customer_reviews.author: Forshey

customer_reviews.title: Love This Brand! ...and so do my pups.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I generally bought BENEFUL HEALTHY WEIGHT, but it was unavailable. I like the fact that it's weight management and has larger pieces than my usual brand. My dog generally swallows the food before it hits his mouth!! The chunks were a bigger size, so he was forced to chew them. He also has a slow feeder bowl, so this combination works for us. I will now continue to buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KristinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Huge bag, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value (huge size) and convenient zipper closure for easy storage and access. My medium sized dog loves the food (25 lbs) and is none the wiser it's for weight control. The bite sized pieces are easy to digest. The box is heavy, but the shipping was super fast (we were running out of dog food!) and buying like this was very convenient (skipping the extra trip to the grocery store). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nina R

customer_reviews.title: Happy, healthy with Pedigree
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food that agrees with my 13 year old dog AND she likes it. She recently had perfect bloodwork and a complete physical with her vet. She had a dental and has all her teeth and they are healthy. No one can believe she is 13! We love her so much! 🐾❤️
customer_reviews.author: kpkeack

customer_reviews.title: Riley Approved. My old Lab has dropped a few pounds thanks to this food.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Lab can't wait to get a bowl of Pedigree Healthy Weight Adult Dry Dog Food. Sounds like a paid advertisement, but its not. Riley was starting to loose her girlish figure until we changed up her food to Pedigree Healthy Weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: It’s dog food.
customer_reviews.text: It asked me about the flavor and I can’t personally say but I spoke with my dogs and they said it was good. After they they went and licked themselves and then ate some poop in the yard. Soooo, apparently they aren’t real picky. But they ate it all. As far as weight management, well my meth lab would eat the entire bag if I let her so I can’t say it helps with weight loss. Thinking a weight watchers support group might be more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Vet approves, Pet clearly does too!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog will eat ANYTHING, so we can't really say this is a more enticing product for her... but our vet gives his dog the same food, which we like knowing. We also have had several large dogs live 15-16 years eating this and similar Purina products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Delivered perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Only brand my dogs eat, vet recommended since my first dog, never had any issues with allergies with this brand. Ordered it for the first time on amazon and the delivery was great the bag wasn’t damaged at all unlike the stores
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats this every day and he’s a very picky eater so it must be good. I was worried that this wasn’t the best quality dog food I could get him but it turns out in an article I recently read this dog food rates pretty high. So he and I are both happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peantell

customer_reviews.title: Good product with painless process
customer_reviews.text: Always use this food to help our large dogs drop a few pounds gained over the winter. They are walked everyday but as aging process occurs, weight wears and tears on bones. Package was delivered in box which was relief. First time to order dog food so was wary of bag being torn. Fast, painless process including an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wise

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it and they seem to do well on it. Will continue to purchase unless they get tired of it. Can''t really qualify the taste except the dogs seem to enjoy it. Never tried it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Connie T. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs with sensitive stomachs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We thought that we would have to have our old Lab put down. Vomiting and diarrhea every day, what a mess. Starting feeding this dog food and it all stopped. She is more alert and has more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Buck M.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs got sick with this.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs. I have been adding this food to their diet. Well 3 out of 4 dogs have gotten sick. They wrecked my rug. This is the only thing that changed. My 4th dog has a different foods and he is fine.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: Mixing with their regular feed. They have been putting on to much weight this winter. Been a pedigree Dog Food person for many years. Now with a weight management product it will help cut down on the calories
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog needed to lose weight and I give her this along with a can of green beans (salt free) to help her feel full without lots of calories (per my vet) . She went from 63 lb to 50lb in the course of about 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Caker

customer_reviews.title: My Diesel loves this
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if my dog would react differently with it being healthy weight food instead of his normal but he still enjoyed it. I will be getting more as 15 pounds lasted my 70 pound dog 2 feedings a day for a month
customer_reviews.author: SlayerWolf

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this food a few times along with other Pedigree flavors to change things up. My dog has become picky as he has aged. I’ll add other things with the food to entice him to eat. He’ll eat, and I am pleased with the value.
customer_reviews.author: texasdreamer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Cannot find it in the grocery and this is the only weight management food my dogs like. They will have to stay on it until they go back to day care.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with this food!
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs will not eat this food, starting throwing it up so I stopped, last bag was fine. Amazon stopped offering it due to complaints, I thought it was resolved but I guess not. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marma's mom

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it arrived on time. I can’t speak for the flavor because I’m nit going to taste it but my dog sure does like it.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa F

customer_reviews.title: Low calorie
customer_reviews.text: My dog cannot exercise very much and the doctor suggested a low. slofie food. All 3 dogs eat this food and seem to enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Helps control "Winter Weight Gain"
customer_reviews.text: My Pit Bull is not a fan of the winter cold - hence less outdoor exercising. This dog food satisfies her hunger while maintaining her Spring/Summer weight.
customer_reviews.author: m miller An ED/Hospice RN

customer_reviews.title: Pedigree- a fine alternative to expensive specialized food
customer_reviews.text: Same price as Walmart and got here fast! My Shiba has been on Pedigree his entire life (now 14 years old) without any issues. My Akita is on fancy, grain free, extremely expensive dog food and she consistently runs to his bowel to steal the Pedigree. Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Lifesogood

customer_reviews.title: Tasty option
customer_reviews.text: We mixed a can of wet with some dry food. One can by itself is not enough for a medium size dog. Nice veggie additives to the meat flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Matt younger

customer_reviews.title: NOT A ZIPPER BAG!
customer_reviews.text: Not a zipper bag, like advertised and ordered.....and the bag arrived with holes in it, and dog food in the box. Crappy packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome prices
customer_reviews.text: Awesome prices for a great food. My dog was put on a special diet after getting pancreatitis. This is the only food I found with %9 or less fat with the vitamins and protein he needs. All other food was $60 or more for a %9 fat or less.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent food for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this food in a pinch when my usual dog food delivery was delayed. The ingredient list isn't very impressive, but it's what you'd expect from a grocery store brand. It worked great as a stop gap and prime delivery kept me from having to schlep a bag of dog food home on the bus.
customer_reviews.author: TelepLikeItIs

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: MY DOG LOVES THIS FOOD. EXCELLENT FOR OVER WEIGHT DOGS.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chet T. Ayres Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs eat it.... just as they ...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs eat it.... just as they eat any brand I place before them. They don't even say thank you though.
customer_reviews.author: L. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: He has had pretty normal poo as well
customer_reviews.text: My dog is still fat but only because he manages to find a way into the pantry to sneak him a snack. I could only imagine how fat he would be if we didn't use this healthy weight formula. He has had pretty normal poo as well.... So that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a horrible allergy reaction because of this food. Not good

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in store
customer_reviews.text: I can purchase a bigger bag at Walmart for just a little more. Not worth the wait for the price

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this which counts a lot. I feed him snacks, bad habit so he does need to shed a few pounds.

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog so sick!!

customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. My Sophie has a delicate tummy, and this is the best food I've found for her. Used to buy iams, but it upset her stomach and we found this better for her particular tummy. Both fur-balls have wonderful, soft coats and are happy, healthy dogs.

customer_reviews.text: Dogs liked it, but it's not very healthy. Only reasonably priced diet dog food I could find.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. Great price. Their coats are super shiny.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like to eat but they get overweight
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like to eat but they get overweight. Since I started on my pedigree weight food I have kept their weight under control and they lick their bowls because they enjoyed it

customer_reviews.text: My dogs have always been fed Pedigree and the weight management is really working for them.

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My large black lab has been eating very expensive diet food for years. I decided to try Pedigree and he loves it! It is even better that I didn't have to lug it home from the store!

customer_reviews.text: What happened to the zipper top on this product? The last time I ordered it, there wasn't one, and I had to rip open the top and hold it closed with a large clip. These bags should not be shipped if they don't have the zipper top!

customer_reviews.title: Pedigree Healthy Weight Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our dogs this brand for a few years now. The vet says it is okay and the dogs seem to love it. They are both healthy and have shiny coats.

customer_reviews.text: Great dog food, I buy through the subscription plan and get 3 delivered every 2 months. The Zipper on top is great, and my dog really loves the food

customer_reviews.title: No ziplock stale food
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is it is pictured with the ziplock and it came without it I have small dogs who don't eat much at a time so now they will have stale food by mid month Amazon get your pictures right

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the dog loves it. Our old rottweiler shepherd mix gets picky after a while with most foods but not this one.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok food... I probably wouldn't purchase it again because I don't believe it has enough nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsavesLife

customer_reviews.title: Pedigree canned has changed their recipe recently to homestyle and since then her gas issues have gotten much worse. Quit feedin
customer_reviews.text: Pedigree products have caused issues for our black lab. Used for years and in the past six months she's become extremely anxious, thirsty all the time, restless, gassy. Researched online and it seems pedigree was behind these issues in many dog's recently. Pedigree canned has changed their recipe recently to homestyle and since then her gas issues have gotten much worse. Quit feeding pedigree for two weeks. Only gave Hamburg and rice and then introduced purina one. Vast improvement. Will not feed her pedigree again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My very small dog loves it and she's very picky what she eats.
customer_reviews.author: David L ( Rochester, Mn

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and really helps keep the weight down. My dog also likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: dog loves it and it conveniently arrives at your door!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves it and it really helps to keep her weight in check.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I subscribe to it and save!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater but he loves this dog food! I tried all different brands and types but he just throws them up and looks uninterested. But then I switched to this kind and now he gobbles it down! I first bought it in stores, but then I found it on here for subscribe and save. It is a little cheaper that way, so I buy it online and my dog gets excited when it comes in the mail. Some other reviewers complained that the price tag was too high but it was not that expensive when I bought it for about $13. That's more reasonable, otherwise I would just buy it at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: My dog was diagnosed with diabetes when she was about 2 years old - I had been feeding her Nature's Recipe food for a while, since it didn't have corn, and was the least expensive corn-free food I could find. Then I found this new kind of Pedigree (my dog had eaten Pedigree BEFORE her diabetes set in) and she loves it! Pancreatitis was the cause for her diabetes - not obesity - but this food keeps her weight in check, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Little Fish

customer_reviews.title: Check the food before you order
customer_reviews.text: It’s had mold in my dog food and I had to throw it away

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and it seems to digest very well

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of Bag Spoiled/Moldy Last Two Times
customer_reviews.text: So, the product is usually good, but the last two times I've ordered this, the bottom of the bag was spoiled and smelled moldy. Will give it one more shot, seems like a warehouse issue

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag was torn when received. Looks like whoever put the bag in the box grabbed the bag by the zipper seal, damaging the bag. Dog food spilled in box.

customer_reviews.title: One pound down
customer_reviews.text: My dog lost a pound which may not sound like a lot but it is!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Corn-Free and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: With 3-60lb inside dogs, I needed to find something that all 3 could tolerate with digestion and not break the bank, while giving them what their bodies needed. I found it. In the past, I've tried several of the expensive brands, but 2 of my dogs had tummy trouble - even after taking 1 month to transition between foods. So, when all 3 were agreeable with this one I was elated. Now the 2 girls and 1 boy and keep their weight at a healthy number.

customer_reviews.title: Man's dog is his best friend
customer_reviews.text: A man's dog is his best friend.I was sick and couldn't go shopping, Delivered right to my door for my friend"Rocky"

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. One of my dogs has colitis and she does not get sick from this food. Big value or your money. Love the resealable bag too.

customer_reviews.title: Digestive porblems
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked it fine but it gave him a bad case of the farts and we had to stop feeding it to him or move to a bigger house !
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good food that my little dog likes
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is quite happy with this kibble and a bag lasts for a long time with him (supplemented with homemade high protein super healthy dog treats). LOL. Sometimes, when I am out of treats, I grab a handful and give him some, making him run for his food. He's happy and that is what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: my dog wont eat this
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't eat this unless he is starving, or if I mix it with moist food. Also had a packaging issue with one of the two bags I bought. Convenient with free shipping since I ride a bus.
customer_reviews.author: Joey H

customer_reviews.title: Doggy tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't love it as much as my dog does. In the years he has been with us, he hasn't exactly been a picky eater, but dry dog food is not his first choice. However, he eats this well and it helps me to keep his weight down as he is a breed with a tendency to gain weight.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: BIG DOGS LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: With 3 BIG dogs (mastiff, boxer & shepherd), I've been feeding Healthy Weight for years and it helps me control their weight, which is so important.. With a fractured back, having the food delivered directly to my house has been a life, or back, saver.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Rescue Mom

customer_reviews.title: works for overweight dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog was overweight, he had no waist. I started using Pedigree Healthy weight dry dog food and slowly the weight came off. He looks great. :I live in a rual area and was so happy Amazon carries this food.
customer_reviews.author: Margie A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this dog food. It has helped keep their weight down since they are Dachshunds. My vet told me it is very important for them to be at a healthy weight for their backs. I will be avoiding back surgery later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. We also us Purina light n healthy, and they like that also. They need a little weight control since they've all been fixed and are getting older, it's harder for them to keep their weight down.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand of dog food that I always get for my older somewhat over weight dog. Imagine my surprise when I looked it up on Amazon and found it $2.00 cheaper than at my grocery store. I live in the country and love having it delivered to my door. So I thank you and so does my dog!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: They love this. I mix it with the Kibbles & ...
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs watch when I start serving this into their dishes, don't seem to want to wait until I get out of the way. They love this. I mix it with the Kibbles & Bits, so they get both every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie C Smith

product_meta.title: Pedigree Weight Management Adult Dry & Wet Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Dog Food| Flavor Name:Chicken & Vegetables| Size:15 lb.PEDIGREE Healthy Weight Roasted Chicken & Vegetable Flavor Dog Food is a low-fat, meaty dog food specially formulated to help less active or overweight dogs achieve and maintain a healthy weight. This balanced dog food is packed with vitamin E antioxidants to nourish your dog's immune system, plus omega-6 fatty acids to give them healthy skin and a soft, shiny coat. Now with no high fructose corn syrup, no artificial flavors, and no added sugar. PEDIGREE Diet Dog Food is also made with a special fiber blend to help dogs feel fuller. With PEDIGREE Food for Dogs, you can give your loyal companion a satisfying and nutritious meal without the extra calories.
feature_bullets: Contains One (1) 15-Pound Bag Of Pedigree Healthy Weight Chicken Flavor Dry Dog Food
This Low-Fat Dog Food Is A Healthy Recipe With High-Quality Protein To Help Keep Your Dog Fit And Active
Our delicious chicken-flavor, meaty dog food satisfies and helps dogs maintain a healthy weight
Pedigree Healthy Weight Targeted Nutrition Dog Food Contains A Special Fiber Blend To Aid In Digestion And Help Your Dog Feel Full
Pedigree Dry Dog Food Features Unique, Crunchy Kibble To Help Keep Dogs' Teeth Clean
